item.description: I've started a new Meetup especially for those of us who live north of Hartford. We'll be meeting every third Tuesday at the Enfield Cinemas (in the Enfield Square mall), when all movies are just $6.00! Our first movie will be Tropic Thunder next Tuesday, August 19. The movie starts at 7:00, and you can meet me in front of the theater anytime after 6:45. Depending on the size of the group, we'll probably head over to Friendly's or Starbucks after the movie for a discussion. And yes, we will be talking about the "R-word"!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the big bearded guy outside the theater wearing a Hawaian-style shirt
item.name: Enfield Night at the Movies August Meetup
